Use and Citation¶

Citation¶

The BibTeX entry for citing the DNNLikehood project is

@article{DNNL,
   author         = "Coccaro, Andrea and Pierini, Maurizio and Silvestrini, Luca and Torre, Riccardo",
   title          = "{The DNNLikelihood: enhancing likelihood distribution with Deep Learning}",
   year           = "2019",
   eprint         = "1911.03305",
   archivePrefix  = "arXiv",
   primaryClass   = "hep-ph",
   reportNumber   = "CERN-TH-2019-187",
}

Published DNNLikelihoods¶

List of published likelihoods

Updating list of HEPData entries for publications using HistFactory JSON likelihoods:

  • Andy Buckley, Matthew Citron, Sylvain Fichet, Sabine Kraml, Wolfgang Waltenberger, and Nicholas Wardle. The Simplified Lik Framework. JHEP, 04:064, 2019. arXiv:1809.05548, doi:10.1007/JHEP04(2019)064.
